title: Ball Busters
headline: A game created using HTML canvas ,vanilla js
searchDescription: One of my initial projects, a game created using HTML canvas, Vanilla js while learning the basics of js
longDescription: A game created using HTML canvas, Vanilla js while learning the basics of js

title: Resume Analyzer
headline: College final year project, trying out different resume analysis tools ended up making our own
searchDescription: A web app designed to optimise your resume, match your resume, create personalised cover letters and describe your resume persona
longDescription: Inspired by the resume analysis tools I used to apply to jobs, we decided to make my own. We used Streamlit to create a web app that allows you to upload your resume and get a detailed analysis of your resume. We used the Gemini API to create a personalised cover letter and describe your resume persona.

title: Role Bases Access Control Dashboard
headline: UI only RBAC dashboard
searchDescription: UI-only functionality should focus on managing Roles, Permissions, and Users efficiently while ensuring a seamless user experience.
longDescription: I created a UI only RBAC dashboard, with Roles, Permissions, and Users. I used Nextjs and Tailwind CSS to create the dashboard.

title: Typo Defence
headline: AWS Game Builder hackathon submission.
searchDescription: Typing game but with a twist. Type out the common typos in a sentence to destroy the enemy and get extra points or take 2x damage.
longDescription: Typing game but with a twist. Type out the common typos in a sentence to destroy the enemy and get extra points or take 2x damage.

title: AI Teaching Assistant
headline: Nosu AI Hackathon winner project (super awesome cool prize)
searchDescription: An AI teaching assistant you that can explain topics ranging from complicated school problems to real life advice Â· (not responsible for anything wrong AI says <3)
longDescription: It was an online hackathon. I created an AI teaching assistant that simply helps your with your doubts and questions. You can upload a image using the camera function or ask verbally and have a real-time conversation with our assistant.

title: Dish Dash Momzie
headline: Helps you solve the problem of 'Aaj Kya khaye?'
searchDescription: We bring your ingredients out on to a plate without the hussle bussle of googling between different cuisines
longDescription: Started as a fun learning project, Soon to be lanched and on your phones
